tests.title: Perform 1:N Identification
tests.fullTitle: Checking User Permission for Verification User Role Perform 1:N Identification
tests.code:
console.log("--Perform 1:N Identification--")
identifyResponse = await request (url)
    .post("/api/FaceRecognition/identify")
    .set("Accept", "*/*")
    .set("Content-Type", "application/json")
    .set("Authorization", `Bearer ${accessToken}`)
    .send({
        photoData: idImage,
        faceThreshold: "1.0",
        maxResults: "10",
        genderFilter:null
    })
expect(identifyResponse.status).to.equal(403);
